extendedInfo.description: The only way to experience Philly Beer Week 2011!Philly Beer Week (June 3-12, 2011) is a 10-day celebration of the BestBeer Drinking City in America. Philly Beer Week highlights the region'sdiverse beer scene - its world-class breweries, neighborhood taverns,trend-setting restaurants, and rich beer culture.To any mere beer-drinking mortal, there are so many events happeningthat it can be overwhelming.As obsessive fans of Philly Beer Week we decided to make an app thatwould help maximize your Philly Beer Week experience:1) Find out about what events are going on now2) Browse events going on during Philly Beer Week3) View details on an event4) Build a personalized schedule

reviews.title: Slick!!!
reviews.comment: Truly an awesome app, all of the events are listed and you can search by venue, brewers, neighborhood etc... You can save events to your calendar, and get directions to everywhere with the integrated Google maps and navigation. I really couldn\'t think of any thing else to add to this amazing app, it\'s a must have for PBW 2011!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app, very useful and a must have for Beer Week.
reviews.author: A Google User
